content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --LNKGRP
      operator: multiple_references
      value: $VALUE_COUNTS
Operations:
  - id: $VALUE_COUNTS
    name: --LNKGRP
    operator: variable_value_counts
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0024
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: When --LNKID is present in a domain, it must also be present in another
  domain
Outcome:
  Message: --LNKID is present in only one domain.
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Domain
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0024
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: --LNKID is a grouping identifier used to identify
                  a record in one domain that is related to records in another domain,
                  often forming a one-to-many relationship.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: 2.E.1
                Section: 4.2.6
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: When --LNKID is present in a domain, it must also be present in another domain

Outcome.Message: --LNKID is present in only one domain.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: --LNKID is a grouping identifier used to identify a record in one domain that is related to records in another domain, often forming a one-to-many relationship.
